title: When are servers up?
body:
So they are supposed to be up soon,
but when? Can anyone tell me how much longer i have to wait

Thanks.

replies.body: Scheduled maintenance was going on in EUW as of the time you created this post and ended a few hours shortly after. If you're still having issues logging in, please let me know.
i cant log in at all on na all day long so far just says i cant connect to pvp .net i've tried everything on the site

We're aware of some players on Century Link who are seeing login issues. We're investigating and working with Century Link directly in order to resolve it, but for now, you may want to use a Virtual Private Network (VPN) to reroute your connection and bypass the login issue.

We're tracking the issue on [this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/B2VFcQKX-stuck-at-logging-in-after-maintenance), so keep your eyes on that post for an update on this. Let me know if you have any questions.
